title: Communist Movement of Turkey
text:
The Communist Movement of Turkey (, TKH) is a <a href="communist%20party">communist party</a> in <a href="list%20of%20political%20parties%20in%20Turkey">Turkey</a>. The TKH was split from the <a href="People%27s%20Communist%20Party%20of%20Turkey">People's Communist Party of Turkey</a> in 2015, which was split from the <a href="Communist%20Party%20of%20Turkey%20%28current%29">Communist Party of Turkey</a> in 2014.
The TKH is one of the components in the <a href="United%20June%20Movement">United June Movement</a>, a political coalition initiative which was founded after <a href="Gezi%20Park%20protests">Gezi Park revolt</a>.
